title: What is quantum tunneling? How fast is this process? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tunneling is a quantum mechanical effect. A tunneling current occurs when particles move through a barrier that they classically shouldn't be able to move through. This phenomenon is said to be faster than light. For detailed explanation I would recommend you to watch the video “is quantum tunneling faster than light” on you tube by a channel named ‘PBS space time’.
